title: Sesam Doener Hannover Hauptbahnhof
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located on the upper floor of the Hannover main train station, in one of the little side corridors, opposite Nordsee. Offers a vegan falafel wrap with different dressings, some of which are vegan. They know about veganism and can tell me which dressings you can use. As of May 2014, price for vegan wrap is EUR 3,50.
